page.title: 08FASHION
page.content: {Fashions in the Malone area. On examining the varying lifestyles of the people living in the Malone area, we came to the conclusion that the majority of the inhabitants, being mainly over 25,are conservative dressers. The younger generation, although not outrageous in their dress, keep well up with the latest fashions. Chain stores proved to be overwhelmingly the most popular throughout all age groups. Popular hair fashions in the younger generation are no longer short, spiked styles, but at the moment are shoulder length bobs and perms. Not only in the Malone area, but all over the province, floral designs, pastel and bright colours are worn in loose baggy styles. The Malone area has a wide range of age groups and therefore a wide range of fashions.
